frontmatter.title: Bryle Bot – Retrieval-Augmented Question Answering Chatbot

node.html: Developed an AI-powered chatbot with Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) that combines web scraping and document parsing to deliver dynamic, real-time answers.

frontmatter.title: Mini Bookmark – Content Extraction & Archiving Tool

node.html: Built a bookmarking app that fetches and parses main article content from URLs.
Created a web app to remove backgrounds from both images and videos.
